column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Authorities have conducted an antibacterial cleaning operation at  CIS (Canadian International School ) on Koh Pich
column4: after the discovery of a new case of Covid-19 on a 49-year-old Canadian man working there.------The disinfection was carried out after the Ministry of Education
column5: Youth and Sport temporarily closed the school
column6: while teachers and students at the school were required to undergo a 14-day health screening at the Ministry of Health.------Further work will be undertaken to directly and indirectly research the affected persons for further action.------The Ministry of Education
column7: Youth and Sports has also issued a press release on the implementation of early vacations for public and private education institutions in Phnom Penh and Siem Reap. ------MoYES
